actions.text: On agreeing to the Brown (MD) amendment (A014) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A014) offered by Mr. Brown (MD).
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Brown (MD) amendment (A014) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole

description: An amendment numbered 24 printed in Part A of House Report 115-783 to ensure none of the funds made available by this Act may be used to transfer the information technology contracting and acquisition services or the Senior Leader Communications functions of the Defense Information Systems Agency.
purpose: An amendment numbered 24 printed in Part A of House Report 115-783 to ensure none of the funds made available by this Act may be used to transfer the information technology contracting and acquisition services or the Senior Leader Communications functions of the Defense Information Systems Agency.
